name: Quorbit
description:
Quorbit

Presenting Quorbit, another game created in PICO-8!

Collect gems with the ball as it orbits the planet. Control its speed with the arrow keys. Smaller gems are worth more points. Don't crash!

Controls
Left/Down — Slow down
Right/Up — Speed up
Z/X — Select/back (in menus)

Follow me on Twitter for updates!
